channel.title: [pi] making certain items always drop when pked [pi]
channel.description: hey guys, i have a pk server and right now we have items which are rare and when people are pked they keep these items in the 3 items kept when killed. i wonted to know is there a way i can add these items id to a list of some sort so they will always be droped or never kept when killed, thankyou

item.title: [pi] making certain items always drop when pked [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“s w 3 3 t1, post:5, topic:389455”]does the item with the highest cost get kept?[/quote]highest 3 unless the person dies who skulled first

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] making certain items always drop when pked [pi]

item.title: [pi] making certain items always drop when pked [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“loock31, post:3, topic:389455”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=485376.msg3556255#msg3556255 date=1301921988]
I don’t know a lot about the PI pking/combat system as I stay away from it, but from what I have read before there is a file in the cfg folder that deals with 100% drops. See if that works, or is that just for npc?
[/quote]
the file your aiming @ is NPCdrops.tms if i’m right, so it’s only for npc’s.
just wanted to make that clear, so the guy wouldnt go and look for it.[/quote]

Oh…well if it’s that case then it probably doesn’t have one in the server itself you would have to manually create that file ( if it’s possible not sure…)

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] making certain items always drop when pked [pi]

item.title: [pi] making certain items always drop when pked [pi]
item.dc:creator: @loock31 loock31
item.description:
@loock31 wrote:

Loveandpower:

I don’t know a lot about the PI pking/combat system as I stay away from it, but from what I have read before there is a file in the cfg folder that deals with 100% drops. See if that works, or is that just for npc?

the file your aiming @ is NPCdrops.tms if i’m right, so it’s only for npc’s.
just wanted to make that clear, so the guy wouldnt go and look for it.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] making certain items always drop when pked [pi]
